job_title: MOBILE / WEB APPLICATION DEVELOPER ? CO-OP POSITION
job_description: Position Description Cambian is looking for enthusiastic, hard working and highly motivated computer science co-op students to participate in the development of patient-centric healthcare IT systems.If you want to get experience solving challenging problems, delivering high-impact solutions to customers, employing leading-edge technologies, and working with extraordinary people, Cambian is the place for you! We are recruiting candidates for 4 or 8 month work terms involving the design, implementation, and testing of Mobile / Web application technologies. The selected candidates will work with a team of Cambian developers on one or more groundbreaking healthcare information technology applications.Knowledge of the healthcare IT market is desirable but not necessary.About us Cambian is a leading healthcare information technology solution provider. Cambian delivers solutions including world-class products, integrated systems, enabling technologies, and managed information services. Cambian is headquartered in Surrey, BC, and services customers across North America.
job_requirements: Qualifications and Experience We are looking for candidates with the following skills, abilities, and credentials:Skilled in Java EE, XML, SQLMobile app development on iOS or Android platformsGUI development including working knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, XMLObject-oriented designIntegration of third party componentsTest case developmentGood troubleshooting skillsAble to work in a team environmentExcellent English written and oral communication skillsWorking towards a bachelor's degree in computer science or an engineering/scientific disciplineOpen To All Majors:No
